<MethodEndpoint

</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the URL to the payment page.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"backUrl":{"type":"string","description":"The URL where the user will be redirected after payment processing.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"quantity":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"description":"The payment quantity.","nullable":true,"example":[{"key":"some text","value":1234}]}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for the payment URL configuration with quantity information.","title":"PaymentUrlRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
